sect2.title: Syntax
sect2.para: This element occurs in the elements download, search_replace and textdump.

sect2.title: Description
sect2.para: The element file is used to specify the file in a download, search_replace or textdump element.

sect2.title: Examples
sect2.para: The first example is a search_replace.
sect2.programlisting: echo Performing substitution in runit.sh cd /usr/src/mypackage cp runit.sh /tmp/foo.$$ sed -e 's/BINDIR/\/bin/' /tmp/foo.$$ > runit.sh
sect2.para: The second example is a textdump.
sect2.programlisting:
echo Generating file group cd /etc
cat > group << 'EOF' root:x:0: bin:x:1: sys:x:2: kmem:x:3: tty:x:4: tape:x:5: daemon:x:6: floppy:x:7: disk:x:8: lp:x:9: dialout:x:10: audio:x:11: EOF
